fields.name: studyId
fields.title: Study unique ID
fields.description: Semicolon-separated list of (internal) study identifiers (cross-referencing to study worksheet) where the event was recorded.

fields.name: dataFileLink
fields.title: Data file link
fields.description: Link to the data file (or digital object) in a public database or in a persistent institutional repository; or identifier of the data file when submitted together with the MIAPPE submission.

fields.name: dataFileDesc
fields.title: Data file description
fields.description: Description of the format of the data file. May be a standard file format name, or a description of organization of the data in a tabular file.

fields.name: dataFileVersion
fields.title: Data file version
fields.description: The version of the dataset (the actual data).
